feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Titlebar For Everyone 0.4
entry.content: Update titlebar-for-everyone.wh.cpp

entry.title: Explorer Unlocked Toolbars Fix (WINAPI) 1.0.0
entry.content: This mod does the same as the mod Explorer Unlocked Toolbars Fix but does so by hooking only a WINAPI function, so does not need the download of the debugging symbols.

entry.title: Translucent Windows 1.6.2
entry.content: • Fixed ExplorerPatcher taskbar theme bugs

entry.title: Enable Win10 taskbar on Win11 24H2 0.1.2
entry.content: Update readme

entry.title: Translucent Windows 1.6.1
entry.content:
• Custom painted theme parts made DPI aware
  • Use system's accent palette for accent colorizer

entry.title: Windows 11 Old Task Manager 1.0.1
entry.content: • Fix dark mode being partially enabled

entry.title: Windows 11 File Explorer Styler 1.2.1
entry.content:
• Added the Translucent Explorer11 theme.
  • Added ThemeResource support to WindhawkBlur.

entry.title: Translucent Windows 1.6.0
entry.content:
• Introduce custom painted windows theme parts using the Direct2D API
  • Fix window flickering

entry.title: Firefox border fix for Classic theme 1.0.1
entry.content: A little optimization

entry.title: Firefox border fix for Classic theme 1.0.0
entry.content: Workaround for the Firefox bug 1950145 (glitched window borders in Classic theme). It affects Firefox builds 129.0a1 and above.

entry.title: Legacy (Win32) clock flyout (Win11-friendly) 1.0.0
entry.content:
This mod restores the Win32 tray clock flyout on Windows 10 taskbar which may run under Windows 10 or Windows 11. I tried to push this as an update to the mod Win32 Tray Clock Experience but received no response from the author. The differences between this mod and the other one are as follows:

  • This mod is is compatible with a Win10 taskbar running under Windows 11.
  • This mod hooks only a Win API function, thus does not need the download of the symbols.
  • This mod is closer to the original code from Explorer Patcher.

entry.title: Legacy (Win32) power flyout 1.0.0
entry.content: Enables legacy power flyout on Windows 10 taskbar (running under either Windows 10 or Windows 11).

entry.title: Legacy (Win32) sound volume flyout 1.0.0
entry.content: Enables legacy sound volume flyout on Windows 10 taskbar (running under either Windows 10 or Windows 11).

entry.title: Aerexplorer 1.8.1
entry.content:
• Hook ExplorerFrame.dll symbols after checking its version
  • Fix the "Open" command for EXE files not having an icon with the Command bar icons option enabled

entry.title: Aerexplorer 1.8.0
entry.content:
• Fixes for classic theme
  • NOTE: Arrows not showing on the navigation pane is a bug in comctl32.dll that will probably be fixed in a separate mod at another time.
  • Use LoadLibraryExW with LOAD_LIBRARY_SEARCH_SYSTEM32 (#2063)
  • Option for "Views" dropdown on left like Windows Vista
  • Option for icons on all command bar items like Windows Vista
  • Reject ExplorerFrame.dll with a build number higher than 21332 (#1618)

entry.title: UXTheme hook 1.4
entry.content:
• fix arm64 support
  • remove buggy DUI control panel header fix

entry.title: Classic Winver 1.1.0
entry.content:
• Improve detection for 95/98/NT4 to account for IE4 desktop update shell32.dll
  • This unfortunately means that users must enter the version text for 95 and 98, as distinction between the two is impossible

entry.title: Titlebar For Everyone 0.3
entry.content:
• Fix the "Show/Hide debug targets" window being invisible, and thus making the whole window unusable, in Visual Studio
  • Add support for the new Microsoft Teams app
  • Add support for hiding the broken custom window controls in WinUI apps (PowerToys, Photos), and the new Teams app

entry.title: Winver Text Customizer 1.0.0
entry.content:
Winver Text Customizer

This mod customizes the text sent to the ShellAbout API by winver.exe. This is useful if you want to have a fake "evaluation copy" text, since that is only displayed by winver.exe and not other instances of ShellAbout.

Preview:

entry.title: Classic Winver 1.0.1
entry.content:
• Hide divider when no about bitmap in 7+ layout
  • This behavior is accurate to the real implementation, and is especially needed since BrandingLoadImage is seemingly broken outside of winver.exe in recent Windows 11 builds
